item.title: Stock Analysis
item.description: In this chapter, we will investigate stock data from NYSE and DIJA. While doing so, basic financial theory and concepts will be explained and applied to real stock data.

item.title: The Inverted Yield Curve
item.description: We are investigating US yield data from the FRED database to analyse the predictive power of inverted yield curves to its ability to forecast recessions.

item.title: GDP Decomposition
item.description: Investigating the different components of GDP and how much each factors contributes to the countryÂ´s growth.
